scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.test: npm run delete:reports && CYPRESS_RETRIES=2 npx cypress run; npm run mochawesome:merge; npm run junit:merge
scripts.cy:run_browser: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser firefox --group Firefox --ci-build-id 2 & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome --group Chrome --ci-build-id 2
